Make Agent

Source: R/agentFactory.R
makeAgent.Rd

Make Agent

makeAgent(name, env, conf = NULL)

Arguments

name

The name of the Agent
env

The environment to initialize the Agent
conf

The configuration

Value

[AgentArmed].

Examples

makeAgent("AgentDQN", makeGymEnv(name ="CartPole-v0"), getDefaultConf("AgentDQN"))
#> <AgentDQN>
#>   Inherits from: <AgentArmed>
#>   Public:
#>     act: function (state) 
#>     act_cnt: 2
#>     advantage: NULL
#>     afterEpisode: function (interact) 
#>     afterStep: function () 
#>     brain: SurroNN, Surrogate, R6
#>     buildConf: function () 
#>     clip_td_err: FALSE
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     conf: RLConf, R6
#>     createInteract: function (rl_env) 
#>     customizeBrain: function (policy_fun = NULL, value_fun = NULL) 
#>     env: EnvGym, Environment, R6
#>     epochs: 1
#>     evaluateArm: function (state) 
#>     extractTarget: function (i) 
#>     gamma: 0.99
#>     getXY: function (batchsize) 
#>     getYhat: function (list.states.old) 
#>     glogger: RLLog, R6
#>     initialize: function (env, conf) 
#>     initializeConf: function (conf) 
#>     initializeEnv: function (env) 
#>     interact: Interaction, InteractionBase, R6
#>     learn: function (iter) 
#>     list.acts: NULL
#>     list.replay: NULL
#>     loginfo: function (str, ...) 
#>     lr_decay: 0.999000499833375
#>     mem: ReplayMemUniform, ReplayMem, R6
#>     model: SurroNN, Surrogate, R6
#>     network_build_funs: list
#>     observe: function (interact) 
#>     p.next: NULL
#>     p.old: NULL
#>     plotPerf: function () 
#>     policy: PolicyProbEpsilon, PolicyEpsilonGreedy, Policy, R6
#>     replay: function (batchsize) 
#>     replay_delta: NULL
#>     replay.freq: 1
#>     replay.size: 64
#>     replay.x: NULL
#>     replay.y: NULL
#>     sess: tensorflow.python.client.session.Session, tensorflow.python.client.session.BaseSession, tensorflow.python.client.session.SessionInterface, python.builtin.object
#>     setAdvantage: function (adv) 
#>     setBrain: function () 
#>     state_dim: 4
#>     task: value_fun
#>     updateFreq: NULL
#>     vec.arm.q: 0 0
#>     yhat: NULL
